Text:
mmapper your title is slightly misleading.  The actual dl title is THE
NEW AMERICAN ROGET’S COLLEGE THESAURUS
IN DICTIONARY FORM and while page 9 says "This edition of Roget’s Thesaurus is both a dictionary of synonyms and a thesaurus...", page 10 states emphatically, "This is not a dictionary."

That having been said it reads like a dictionary(with synonyms for definitions) and is an excellent download.  Thanks.

Correction.  This download's cover (page 1) does say NEW AMERICAN WEBSTER HANDY COLLEGE DICTIONARY FOURTH EDITION but that is the only place.  Inside on page 3 it still has a different title page as a thesaurus.  Just be aware that you're getting a thesaurus as opposed to a dictionary.  It's still a cool download.
